name: chrome-sidepanel-extension
description: A Chrome MV3 extension with side panel React app
author: Your Name

scripts.build: plasmo build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('build/chrome-mv3-prod/manifest.json', 'utf8')); manifest.permissions = ['sidePanel', 'activeTab', 'tabs', 'scripting']; manifest.host_permissions = ['https://*/*', 'https://web.whatsapp.com/*']; fs.writeFileSync('build/chrome-mv3-prod/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2));"
